item.title: NaAGP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaAGP4 Gene Name: Arabinogalactan protein4 Genome: Species: Nicotiana alata Functional Descriptions: NaAGP4 is an arabinogalactan protein whose expression is suppressed by wounding and fungal infection inNicotiana alata.

item.title: NaStEP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaStEP Gene Name: Stigma Expressed Protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana alata Functional Descriptions: Here the isolation and characterization of a stigma-specific protein from N.
